messageBody:
Hi,
I have data access calss which looks like as follows


public class JdbcDataAccess implements IDataAccess {

private static JdbcDataAccess s_instance = null;

private PooledConnection m_connectionPool;

public static final JdbcDataAccess getInstance(final
ConnectionPoolDataSource dataSource) {

if (s_instance == null) {

s_instance = new JdbcDataAccess(dataSource);

}

return s_instance;

}

private JdbcDataAccess(final ConnectionPoolDataSource dataSource) {

try {

m_connectionPool = dataSource.getPooledConnection();

} catch (SQLException ex) {

throw new CheckedExceptionWrapper(new DataAccessException(ex.getMessage(),
ex));

}

}
The problem here is its a singleton class so I cannot extend this class. I
need to some how pass the mockconnection object to this class.

Any suggestions how I can do this .


[Ahuja, Mona R]
